name: Covid-19 vaccine data by NHS ICS/STP
desc: NHS England data on vaccine uptake broken down by age group and  NHS Improvement integrated care systems (ICS) and sustainability and transformation partnerships (STP). Period: 8th December 2020 to 28th February 2021.
